articles.title: Philippines scores stunning upset of New Zealand, creating Group A chaos - FOX Sports
articles.description: Sarina Bolden's historic strike – it was her country's first-ever World Cup goal – was enough to push the Philippines over the top.
articles.content:
Sarina Bolden scored the only goal as the Philippines produced a huge 1-0 upset to defeat co-host New Zealand and throw Group A of the Women's World Cup into chaos.
